 boolean dataChangedInStorage(ConnectionContext cc, Row row)
          Using the primary key of the given row, go to the database and load the data into a temporary row and return true if the data in the database has changed.

          Delete the given Row in the database using the primary key of the row that is provided.

          This method is called once all the columns and tables in the entire schema have been created so that foreign-key references and other late-binding activities can take place.

          Returns all the of the Column definitions in this table as an array

          Returns the name of the table as it appears in the database.

          Insert the given Row into the database.
